activities.name: Copy data Rest Api to SQL

sqlReaderQuery.value:
Select '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactoryName,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as Pipeline_Name,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as Pipeline_RunId,
'@{activity('Copy data1').output.rowsRead}' as Rows_Read,
'@{activity('Copy data1').output.rowsCopied}' as Rows_copied,
'@{utcNow()}' as Timestamp

Select '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactoryName,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as Pipeline_Name,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as Pipeline_RunId,
'@{activity('Copy data1').output.errors[0].code}' as Error_code,
'@{replace(activity('Copy data1').output.errors[0].Message,'''','')}' as Error_Description,
'@{utcNow()}' as Timestamp

source.sqlReaderQuery: Select 'EXEC '+ SP_Name +' '''+ SP_value +''' ' as SP ,FileName +'_'+cast(Cast(getdate() as date) as varchar(100)) as Filename from SPList
Select max(id) as MAX, min(id) as MIN from restable
